title: Cant log in
body:
Hi when launching my game i get a message saying Username or Password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password click here.  When i press on the OK button the client just shuts off.  Also clicking the Here link does nothing. i am able to log in here using the same account and i even changed my password however the same thing keeps happening. I have even tried uninstalling and reinstalling the client. 

can you offer some help please.

Just an update the client seems to be working properly now. Thank you
